import {Form, Modal, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useRef} from 'react' export default function AddBudgetModal({show, handleClose}){ const nameRef = useRef() const maxRef = useRef() const addBudget = useBudgets() function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() addBudget({ name: nameRef.current.value, max: parseFloat(maxRef.current.value), }) handleClose() } return (
New Budget Name Maximum Spending
) }
